record1.<11>: # This record tells the SQL connector (DSBFS) which sql vendors are supported, and which vendor specific SCHEMA parser to use
record1.<12>: # If no parser is specified, the connector will use DSBFS_SCHEMA_BASE, which is optimised for MSSQL
record1.<13>: # <1> = semicolon delimited list of Databases.  This is the dropdown in the DSBFS_CONNECTION_WIZARD and CONNECTION_INFO
record1.<14>: # <2> = semicolon delimited list of associated schema programs.  DSBFS will default to  DSBFS_SCHEMA_BASE
